title: DIY Terrarium
description: An illustration showing a clear plastic bottle cut in half, with the bottom half containing layers of soil, small rocks, and green grass. Next to it is the top half of the bottle, which is empty and has a similar shape.

title: Mini Ecosystem in a Bottle
description: An illustration of a mini ecosystem created inside a transparent plastic bottle. The bottle is cut in half, with the top half inverted to form a funnel shape. Inside, there are layers of soil, small plants sprouting, and some insects like a ladybug and an ant. The bottom part contains pebbles, indicating drainage, while the green top rim adds a decorative touch.
